Operation 'get_/media/math/formula/{hash}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Current description is too brief and lacks context about the hash origin and what data is returned. Added clarification about the hash source (x-resource-location header from check endpoint), explicit return value details (TeX formula string and metadata), and use cases (caching, source retrieval). This helps AI agents understand the operation's role in the formula workflow and when to invoke it.

data.current_description:
Returns the previously-stored formula via `/media/math/check/{type}` for the given hash.

Stability: [stable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Stable).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a previously-stored TeX formula by its hash identifier. The hash is obtained from the `x-resource-location` header returned by the `/media/math/check/{type}` POST endpoint. Returns the original TeX formula string and associated metadata including identifier information. This endpoint is useful for retrieving the source formula after validation or for caching purposes.
data.reasoning: Current description is too brief and lacks context about the hash origin and what data is returned. Added clarification about the hash source (x-resource-location header from check endpoint), explicit return value details (TeX formula string and metadata), and use cases (caching, source retrieval). This helps AI agents understand the operation's role in the formula workflow and when to invoke it.
